messages.subject: Just an idea...
messages.msgSnippet: I agree about the HOP thing, if your child wants it you should try and get if for them if possible, if not look it up online and show your child what it
messages.messageBody:
I agree about the HOP thing, if your child wants it you should try
and get if for them if possible, if not look it up online and show
your child what it includes and see if he would like to make his own
version or if he would allow allow you to work with you etc. If he
does it for awhile and backs out then that is okey too, kids need to
do things at their own pace. I also wanted to let you know about
this free online reading help place that my almost 6 yo (oh oh his
birthday is this week!!!) goes because he thinks it is sooo
wonderful, I think it's better than the reading rabbit software as
well so you could ask him if he would like for you to save the link
in his favorites so he can get to it on his own. I hope all is going
well for you! Moza

Link:
http://www.starfall.com/n/level-a/index/play.htm
